column5: Got the Trombly's flyer in the paper today and a Helly Hansen 1 piece survival suit is on for $228.  Seems resonable.  Does anyone know if it is the one with the suspenders inside?
alright i tried google and came up empty,  Trembley's?  is what and where i assume an outdoor store but couldnt find it on-line
Sorry.  Complete spelling mistake.  It is Trombly's.  In Orillia
http://www.tromblystacklebox.com/db/file/1...blys_xmas08.pdf that does seem resonable  nice find

I wonder if  it's Coast Guard certified...I remember seeing a few Helly's at the sportsman's show that were priced nice and low, but they weren't CG approved, which I assume would not make them flotation suits.

Cudz If you can find the Nautilus,it,s a better suit and worth the money. You are more then welcome to stop by my place and see the one I have. Heck ,I may even sell it to ya, as it,s toooo big for me now.LOL  It has suspenders and extra wear protection.
